metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22610 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.3, Safari 15.4, watchOS 8.5, iOS 15.4 and iPadOS 15.4, tvOS 15.4. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8 rodrigo-zaiden> WebKit Bugzilla not public, missing more information. mdeslaur> no indication this affects webkit2gtk so far, marking as not-affected for now

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
